title: Live Updates: Biden Meets With Israel’s Outgoing President
content:
1. Live Updates: Biden Meets With Israel’s Outgoing President  The New York Times
  2. President Biden Welcomes His Excellency Reuven Rivlin, President of the State of Israel  The White House
  3. Live updates: Biden hosts Israel’s president for Oval Office visit as two countries reset relationship  The Washington Post
  4. Biden says he hopes to meet with Israel's new prime minister soon  Reuters
  5. Biden Reaffirms 'Ironclad' U.S. Support for Israel to Outgoing President Rivlin  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
